data.title: Apple on Campus
data.meta_description: Case Western Reserve University supports the use of Apple technology and recommends the Mac for academic and college life.
data.meta_site_name: University Technology, [U]Tech | Case Western Reserve University
data.text:
Case Western Reserve University supports the use of Apple technology and recommends the Mac for academic and college life.

Students: UTech has recommended specifications for your new system. Review them before purchasing your next computer.

Apple Store Available on Campus

For your convenience an Apple Store is available within the University Bookstore. It's located at 11434 Uptown Ave.

Support at Case Western Reserve University

Apple gives you 90 days of complimentary technical support and a limited warranty. You can extend your coverage with the AppleCare Protection Plan. For hands-on help, head to the Apple Support page.

AppleCare+ for Mac is available. It extends coverage to from the original date customers purchased their Mac and adds accidental damage protection, each subject to a service fee. Learn more on Apple's website.

In addition, the UTech Help Desk can help you with your technical questions and issues, online and in-person. Contact them through their website help.case.edu, email address help@case,edu, and phone number 216.368.HELP (4357).

Interested in Institutional Purchases?
